metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9764 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
HashiCorp Consul 1.4.3 lacks server hostname verification foragent-to-agent TLS communication. In other words, the product behaves as ifverify_server_hostname were set to false, even when it is actually set totrue. This is fixed in 1.4.4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9764` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.10.12+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.12+dfsg1-1').
